thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Gina

author: Gina
title: Gina
text: It helps to connect a host family. You can write with them or make a video call. You can change the Dates after the connection and ask the support when you have a problem. Maybe the discribtion of the next steps are a little bit less. Negative is that you can pay only with cards like MasterCard, AmericanExpress etc. and Paypal. I hoped that i can pay with tranfer but it does'nt work. Another point is that you cannot compare the familiy's on one site and that you only see the costs for the travel, when you favourite them.
